osss-api.name: position_school_board_member_trustee
osss-api.description: Elected/appointed governance of the district or school; sets policy and oversees superintendent/head.

osss-api.name: position_board_chair
osss-api.description: Leads the governing board; sets agendas and presides over meetings.

osss-api.name: position_board_vice_chair
osss-api.description: Supports/acts in place of the chair as needed.

osss-api.name: position_board_clerk
osss-api.description: Records board actions; manages official records and notices.

osss-api.name: position_superintendent
osss-api.description: Chief executive of a public school district; accountable to the board.

osss-api.name: position_head_of_school
osss-api.description: Chief executive of an independent/private school.

osss-api.name: position_deputy_superintendent
osss-api.description: Second-in-command over district operations or academics.

osss-api.name: position_associate_superintendent
osss-api.description: Senior executive over major divisions (e.g., teaching & learning).

osss-api.name: position_assistant_superintendent
osss-api.description: Executive leader over specific functions or clusters of schools.

osss-api.name: position_chief_of_staff
osss-api.description: Coordinates executive priorities, cabinet operations, and cross-functional initiatives.

osss-api.name: position_chief_academic_officer
osss-api.description: Leads curriculum, instruction, assessment, and school improvement.

osss-api.name: position_chief_schools_officer
osss-api.description: Oversees school portfolio and principals; drives performance.

osss-api.name: position_chief_operations_officer
osss-api.description: Oversees non-instructional operations (facilities, transport, nutrition, safety).

osss-api.name: position_chief_financial_officer
osss-api.description: Leads finance, budgeting, accounting, and fiscal reporting.

osss-api.name: position_chief_information_officer
osss-api.description: Leads technology strategy, systems, data, and cybersecurity.

osss-api.name: position_chief_technology_officer
osss-api.description: Oversees IT infrastructure, networks, endpoints, and platforms.

osss-api.name: position_chief_human_resources_officer
osss-api.description: Leads talent strategy, employee relations, payroll/benefits, and compliance.

osss-api.name: position_chief_communications_officer
osss-api.description: Directs communications, media relations, branding, and engagement.

osss-api.name: position_chief_equity_officer
osss-api.description: Leads equity, diversity, inclusion initiatives and policy.

osss-api.name: position_general_counsel
osss-api.description: Provides legal guidance; manages risk, contracts, and compliance.

osss-api.name: position_ombudsperson
osss-api.description: Independent, confidential resource for resolving concerns and complaints.

osss-api.name: position_principal
osss-api.description: School-site leader responsible for instruction, operations, and culture.

osss-api.name: position_assistant_principal
osss-api.description: Supports principal in instruction, discipline, operations, and staff supervision.

osss-api.name: position_associate_principal
osss-api.description: Senior AP; often leads major school functions.

osss-api.name: position_head_of_upper_school
osss-api.description: Leads upper/secondary division in independent schools.

osss-api.name: position_dean_of_students
osss-api.description: Leads student conduct, attendance, culture, and MTSS supports.

osss-api.name: position_dean_of_academics
osss-api.description: Oversees curriculum, scheduling, grading, and academic quality.

osss-api.name: position_grade_level_dean
osss-api.description: Oversees a grade’s academic and behavioral support systems.

osss-api.name: position_activities_director
osss-api.description: Leads student activities, clubs, and co-curriculars.

osss-api.name: position_athletics_director
osss-api.description: Leads athletics programs, compliance, facilities, and scheduling.

osss-api.name: position_assistant_athletics_director
osss-api.description: Supports athletic director with operations and compliance.

osss-api.name: position_classroom_teacher
osss-api.description: Core instruction in content areas at elementary, middle, or high school.

osss-api.name: position_high_school_teacher
osss-api.description: Subject-specific instruction at high school level.

osss-api.name: position_physical_education_teacher
osss-api.description: PE instruction; fitness, health, and wellness.

osss-api.name: position_reading_interventionist
osss-api.description: Targeted literacy interventions and progress monitoring.

osss-api.name: position_math_interventionist
osss-api.description: Targeted math interventions and progress monitoring.

osss-api.name: position_instructional_coach
osss-api.description: Job-embedded coaching on pedagogy and curriculum.

osss-api.name: position_literacy_coach
osss-api.description: Specialized coaching in reading and writing instruction.

osss-api.name: position_mentor_teacher
osss-api.description: Supports novice teachers with induction and practice.

osss-api.name: position_teacher_librarian
osss-api.description: Certified librarian providing instruction and curation.

osss-api.name: position_gifted_and_talented_coordinator
osss-api.description: Oversees GT identification, services, and compliance.

osss-api.name: position_english_learner_coordinator
osss-api.description: Oversees EL program, identification, and compliance.

osss-api.name: position_title_i_coordinator
osss-api.description: Oversees Title I compliance and services.

osss-api.name: position_long_term_substitute
osss-api.description: Extended coverage; curriculum and grading responsibilities.

osss-api.name: position_teacher_resident
osss-api.description: Residency preparation role co-teaching with a mentor.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_special_education
osss-api.description: Leads SPED/Exceptional Student Services and compliance (IDEA).

osss-api.name: position_special_education_teacher
osss-api.description: Instruction and services for students with disabilities.

osss-api.name: position_sped_case_manager
osss-api.description: Coordinates IEPs, services, and progress reporting.

osss-api.name: position_school_psychologist
osss-api.description: Evaluation, counseling, MTSS, and IEP support.

osss-api.name: position_vision_specialist
osss-api.description: Services for students with visual impairments.

osss-api.name: position_orientation_and_mobility_specialist
osss-api.description: Travel/orientation training for visually impaired students.

osss-api.name: position_deaf_hard_of_hearing_teacher
osss-api.description: Instruction and support for D/HH students.

osss-api.name: position_504_coordinator
osss-api.description: Leads Section 504 identification and accommodation plans.

osss-api.name: position_sign_language_interpreter
osss-api.description: ASL/interpretation services for students and families.

osss-api.name: position_vocational_specialist
osss-api.description: Career exploration and work-based learning supports.

osss-api.name: position_family_liaison
osss-api.description: Connects families with resources and the school.

osss-api.name: position_school_nurse
osss-api.description: Health services, care plans, medication, records.

osss-api.name: position_health_aide
osss-api.description: Supports nurse; first aid and documentation.

osss-api.name: position_truancy_officer
osss-api.description: Enforces compulsory attendance with due process.

osss-api.name: position_foster_care_liaison
osss-api.description: Coordinates supports for students in foster care.

osss-api.name: position_behavior_support_coach
osss-api.description: Coaches staff on behavior systems and PBIS.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_student_support_services
osss-api.description: Oversees counseling, nursing, social work, and supports.

osss-api.name: position_registrar
osss-api.description: Manages student records, transcripts, and enrollments.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_curriculum_and_instruction
osss-api.description: Leads curriculum adoption, PD, and pedagogy.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_assessment_research_evaluation
osss-api.description: Oversees testing, analytics, and program evaluation.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_data_analytics
osss-api.description: Leads analytics, dashboards, and data governance.

osss-api.name: position_professional_development_coordinator
osss-api.description: Plans and manages staff learning programs.

osss-api.name: position_teacher_induction_coordinator
osss-api.description: New teacher support and certification pathways.

osss-api.name: position_recruiter
osss-api.description: Leads talent sourcing and hiring pipelines.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_technology
osss-api.description: Leads district technology vision and delivery.

osss-api.name: position_it_director
osss-api.description: Alternative title for Director of Technology.

osss-api.name: position_information_security_officer
osss-api.description: Security policy, controls, and incident response.

osss-api.name: position_sis_administrator
osss-api.description: Student information system configuration and support.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_facilities
osss-api.description: Leads facilities strategy, maintenance, and capital projects.

osss-api.name: position_facilities_manager
osss-api.description: Oversees site maintenance and work orders.

osss-api.name: position_plant_manager
osss-api.description: Leads plant operations at large sites.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_transportation
osss-api.description: Leads routing, fleet, and driver operations.

osss-api.name: position_bus_driver
osss-api.description: Student transportation on regular and trip routes.

osss-api.name: position_bus_aide_monitor
osss-api.description: Student supervision and safety on buses.

osss-api.name: position_fleet_manager
osss-api.description: Oversees maintenance shop and fleet lifecycle.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_nutrition_services
osss-api.description: Leads USDA-compliant meal programs and kitchens.

osss-api.name: position_director_of_safety_security
osss-api.description: Leads security strategy, staffing, and incident response.

osss-api.name: position_emergency_management_director
osss-api.description: Plans drills, response, and recovery operations.

osss-api.name: position_school_resource_officer
osss-api.description: Law enforcement officer assigned to schools.

osss-api.name: position_school_secretary
osss-api.description: Front office operations and parent/student support.

osss-api.name: position_receptionist
osss-api.description: Greets visitors, answers phones, and routes inquiries.

osss-api.name: position_data_clerk
osss-api.description: Data entry, audits, and SIS support.

osss-api.name: position_sis_clerk
osss-api.description: Specialist data entry and reports in SIS.

osss-api.name: position_health_office_clerk
osss-api.description: Supports school nurse and health records.

osss-api.name: position_head_coach
osss-api.description: Leads a sport program and coaching staff.

osss-api.name: position_assistant_coach
osss-api.description: Supports head coach with training and supervision.

osss-api.name: position_athletic_trainer
osss-api.description: Sports medicine, injury prevention, and rehab.

osss-api.name: position_communications_director
osss-api.description: Leads comms strategy and media relations.

osss-api.name: position_pathways_coordinator
osss-api.description: Coordinates career/college pathways and work-based learning.

osss-api.name: position_librarian
osss-api.description: Library program lead; instruction and curation.
